LanguageData.PaddyField.label: Paddy field
LanguageData.PaddyField.description: Paddy fields that can raise Wetland rice. Fertility 200% It can only be installed in mud, wetlands and shallows, but because it has abundant moisture and nutrients, it is high performance compared to general purpose type.
LanguageData.PaddyField_Blueprint.label: Paddy field (blueprint)
LanguageData.PaddyField_Frame.label: Paddy field (building)
LanguageData.PaddyField_Frame.description: Paddy fields that can raise Wetland rice. Fertility 200% It can only be installed in mud, wetlands and shallows, but because it has abundant moisture and nutrients, it is high performance compared to general purpose type.
LanguageData.PaddyField_GP.label: Paddy field(Nomal type)
LanguageData.PaddyField_GP.description: Paddy fields that can raise Wetland rice. Fertility 140%. Can be installed other than waterside.
LanguageData.PaddyField_GP_Blueprint.label: Paddy field (blueprint) (blueprint)
LanguageData.PaddyField_GP_Frame.label: Paddy field (blueprint) (building)
LanguageData.PaddyField_GP_Frame.description: Paddy fields that can raise Wetland rice. Fertility 140%. Can be installed other than waterside.
